name: Ghostly Getaway
description:
Ghostly Getaway is a 2D game inspired by "Pacman" created by students at Torrens University. The game is set in a evil ghost prison conveniently modeled into a maze! The main objective of the game is to get out of the prison as quickly as possible. The player must navigate the maze in search of a key which opens a door and lets the player progress!

Key Features:
  • Timed Levels
  • Highscore
  • Volumetric Lighting
Company Bio:

Ghostly Getaway was created by a team of students studying Games Programing and Game Art at Torrens University for their Games Production Foundation Class.
